   <section class="content" id="pnlContent">
    <div class="wrap">
     <div class="padding">
      <article id="content">
       <h1>
        Burlanes Country Cottage Kitchen Design
       </h1>
       <div class="htmlarea">
        <p class="date">
         April 2015
        </p>
        <h3 align="left" style="white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; margin: 0px 0px 15px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 19px; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">
         <span style="font-family: Helvetica;">
          <span style="color: #585858;">
           If you are thinking of renovating or installing a kitchen then it pays to use a professional kitchen designer who will bring fresh ideas and suggest alternative choices that you may not have thought of and may save you money. We recently designed and installed a country kitchen in a Kent village of outstanding beauty.The client wanted a warm country kitchen style in keeping with her beautiful cottage, mixed with sleek, modern worktops and appliances for a fresh update.
          </span>
         </span>
        </h3>
        <h4 align="left" style="white-space: normal; word-spacing: 0px; text-transform: none; margin: 0px 0px 15px; widows: 1; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 19px; text-indent: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;">
         <span style="font-family: Helvetica;">
          <span style="color: #585858;">
           Here's how we achieved a country kitchen with a contemporary twist:
          </span>
         </span>
        </h4>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
         <img alt="Burlanes sleek worktops add a modern touch" src="http://www.burlanes.com/uploads/Burlanes create the perfect country cottage kitchen (10).jpg" style="width: 80%; margin: 0px 10%;"/>
        </p>
        <p>
         <strong>
          Beautiful, slick boira work surfaces in smoke leathered granite sensa from Cosentio
         </strong>
        </p>
        <p>
         <em>
          Sensa by Cosentino is the brand in Cosentinos line of granites with exclusive stain-resistant protection. A revolutionary new anti-stain treatment has now been added to granites well-known properties of high resistance, durability and low porosity. Sensa granites repel liquids such as water and oil, offering highly effective protection against stains.
         </em>
        </p>
        <p>
         <em>
          <br/>
         </em>
         <strong>
          Integrated fridge freezer and food storage, custom built in our workshop as a free standing piece of bespoke handcrafted furniture with a handpainted finish.
         </strong>
        </p>
        <p>
         <strong>
          <img alt="Burlanes custom built handcrafted furniture" src="http://www.burlanes.com/uploads/Burlanes create the perfect country cottage kitchen (11).jpg" style="width: 50%; margin: 0px 25%;"/>
         </strong>
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
         <img alt="A belfast sink in a country cottage kitchen" src="http://www.burlanes.com/uploads/A belfast sink in a country cottage kitchen.jpg" style="width: 50%; margin: 0px 25%;"/>
        </p>
        <p>
         <strong>
          A Belfast sink adds extra rustic charm to a kitchen, and its size makes it a practical choice.
         </strong>
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
         <strong>
          <img alt="Burlanes signature adjustable zig zag shelving" src="http://www.burlanes.com/uploads/Burlanes create the perfect country cottage kitchen (5).jpg" style="width: 50%; margin: 0px 25%;"/>
         </strong>
        </p>
        <p>
         <strong>
          Adjustable zig zag shelving to suit all kitchen storage needs. Functional kitchen design we always incorporate in our signature bespoke kitchen larders.
         </strong>
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
         <img alt="Tiled kitchen splashback" src="http://www.burlanes.com/uploads/Burlanes create the perfect country cottage kitchen (4).jpg" style="width: 50%; margin: 0px 25%;"/>
        </p>
        <p>
         <strong>
          Tiles behind the AGA provide an easy care splashback protecting kitchen walls from water and cooking splashes.
         </strong>
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
         <img alt="Burlanes kitchen cabinet handles" src="http://www.burlanes.com/uploads/Burlanes kitchen cabinet handles.jpg" style="width: 50%; margin: 0px 25%;"/>
        </p>
        <p>
         <strong>
          <a href="http://www.burlanesonline.com/shop/4575912296/Curtain-Poles-Handles" target="_blank">
           Burlanes kitchen cabinet handles
          </a>
          add a unique contemporary twist and make a real statement.
         </strong>
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
         <img alt="" src="http://www.burlanes.com/uploads/Burlanes create the perfect country cottage kitchen (6).jpg" style="width: 50%; margin: 0px 25%;"/>
        </p>
        <p>
         <strong>
          Classic design from Perrin and Rowe
         </strong>
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
         <strong>
          <img alt="Country cottage interior design" src="http://www.burlanes.com/uploads/Burlanes create the perfect country cottage kitchen (2).jpg" style="width: 50%; margin: 0px 25%;"/>
         </strong>
        </p>
        <p>
         We also helped organise the build of a small extension on the cottage by recommending builders so the client had confidence the entire project was being carefully managed. We made a bespoke utility cupboard to fit the space and provide extra storage. We also custom built a pull out drawer seating area in the boot room with a wooden panelled back fitted with shaker peg coat hooks. Natural stone Ca'Pietra tiles running through from the kitchen ensure the overall look is streamlined and a perfect contrast between modern and traditional
        </p>
        <p>
         <strong>
          Luckily our client thought so too!
         </strong>
        </p>
        <h3>
         <em>
          <strong>
           "Thank you so much, the kitchen looks absolutely stunning. Everyone who comes to the cottage thinks it looks beautiful."
          </strong>
         </em>
        </h3>
        <p>
         <a href="http://www.burlanes.com/kitchens/country-kitchens/" target="_blank">
          Click here for more information on Burlanes Country Kitchens
         </a>
        </p>
        <p>
         <a href="http://www.burlanes.com/about-us/testimonials/" target="_blank">
          Click here for more client testimonials
         </a>
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
       </div>
